description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Ever since WWII ended, the left has pretended every election is like fighting World War II. And although that may or may not have worked like 50 years ago, it’s doing the exact opposite the Dems hoped and does not seem to win over undecided voters in Pennsylvania.

Several Pennsylvania undecided voters were asked if they heard that Kamala and the left called Trump literally Hitler this week, which they have. However, when asked if that was “valuable or something you want to hear from Kamala” no one raised their hand.
title: Watch: PA Undecided voters FED UP with the Left: "I'm being pushed toward Trump so strongly..."
